queryMap:
SPARQL '''PREFIX wdt: <http://www.wikidata.org/prop/direct/>
PREFIX wd: <http://www.wikidata.org/entity/>

SELECT ?item WHERE { ?item (wdt:P31/wdt:P279*) wd:Q15548076.} LIMIT 10'''@START

SPARQL '''PREFIX wdt: <http://www.wikidata.org/prop/direct/>
PREFIX wd: <http://www.wikidata.org/entity/>

SELECT ?item WHERE { ?item (wdt:P31/wdt:P279*) wd:Q15548076.} LIMIT 100'''@START
